comments:
N20050518-0010

Got the following NPW when tried to set a breakpoint in Shell#open

java.lang.NullPointerException
at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.actions.BreakpointLocationVerifierJob.run(BreakpointLocationVerifierJob.java:118)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:67)

The NPE indicates that a java element returned "null" for its java project. 
(not sure how that would happen). I have added a null check to account for the 
condition and set default compiler/source compliance levels to 1.5 when this 
happens.
Please verify, Luc. Changes to BreakpointLocationVerifierJob.
